title: Q3 Earnings: Tech Sector in Focus
text: Strong Q3 results from mega-cap Tech players have helped the aggregate Q3 earnings growth rate for the S&P 500 index turn positive in recent days. Regarding the 'Big 7', Apple and Nvidia now represent the final members of the group yet to report.

title: Datadog's stock shrugs off downgrade as some say Amazon AWS trends bode well
text: Datadog Inc. shares shrugged off a Wells Fargo downgrade Friday as Wall Street saw positive read-throughs for the observability company in Amazon.com Inc.'s latest cloud-computing results.

title: Amazon's playbook for happy holidays: discounts, same-day delivery - and AI
text: Generative AI will be Amazon's secret weapon this holiday season, leveraging data from its more than 160 million Prime subscribers to improve ad targeting and allowing merchants to produce promotions quickly.

title: Amazon's 3Q margins plus AI have analysts rock'n to retro tune
text: Amazon.com Inc (NASDAQ:AMZN)'s big third quarter beat on its bottom line had many Wall Street analysts singing the company's praises on Friday, with commentary focused largely on the e-commerce giant's margins.  BofA Securities analysts, for example, noted that the company's holiday outlook suggests some deceleration in growth, but margins are well above estimates and management was constructive on its AWS cloud division's outlook.

title: Amazon Shares Soar on Earnings Beat, Pulling Nasdaq Higher
text: Shares of Amazon (AMZN) jumped as much as 8% on Friday, helping the Nasdaq recover from a tough week.

title: Amazon Stock's 7% Post-Earnings Rally Makes Jeff Bezos $8 Billion Richer
text: Amazon's $87 billion surge in market value narrowed the gap between Bezos and the second-richest man, Bernard Arnault, to $23 billion.

title: Microsoft's AI boost helped cloud business outpace rivals Amazon and Google in latest quarter
text: Large cloud vendors are still helping clients work through necessary cost cuts, but Microsoft Azure has gotten a boost from artificial intelligence

title: More rare dolphins die in new spot along Brazil's Amazon River -report
text: More rare freshwater dolphins in Brazil have been found dead in a new location along the Amazon River, in the latest grim fallout from the longest drought in the rainforest's recorded history.

title: Amazon's (AMZN) Q3 Earnings & Sales Beat Estimates, Up Y/Y
text: Amazon's (AMZN) third-quarter results reflect strength in AWS, Prime, third-party sellers and advertising businesses.

title: Markets Mixed at Midday as Tech Sector Gets a Boost From Amazon
text: U.S. equities were mixed at midday after the latest batch of corporate earnings reports, with the S&P 500 and Nasdaq rising as the tech sector got a boost from Amazon, while the Dow fell.

title: Amazon Q3 Earnings Triple YoY: ETFs to Tap
text: Amazon (AMZN) reported robust third-quarter results, wherein it beat both earnings and revenue estimates. Amazon's cloud computing platform, a record-high Prime Day and a rapidly growing ad sales business drove the results.

title: PCE Index In-Line, +0.4%; Core YoY +3.7% - Lowest Since 2021
text: Spending continued to climb: +0.7% compared with the +0.5% anticipated and the +0.4% posted a month ago.

title: PCE Numbers Come in Line With Expectations
text: PCE Numbers Come in Line With Expectations.

title: Amazon Earnings Call: Best Quarter Since 2021, But Cloud Division Underwhelms
text: Amazon tripled its profit and surpassed revenue expectations for the third quarter

title: Amazon: A Show Of (Margin) Force
text: Amazon.com, Inc.'s third-quarter results showed strong sales growth of 13% to $143.1 billion, exceeding the guidance. Operating margins were impressive at 7.8% of sales, with Amazon Web Services margins recovering and overall operating profits reaching $11.2 billion. Despite slower growth in AWS, the company's overall performance and potential for margin improvement make it an attractive investment.

title: Why Amazon Stock Was Climbing on Friday
text: Sales increased by 13% in the third quarter. Online store sales accelerated for the third straight quarter, while cloud growth was stable.

title: Bulls, Analysts Chime In on Amazon's Blowout Earnings
text: Amazon.com, Inc. (NASDAQ:AMZN) stock is up 7.8% to trade at $128.91 at last check, on track for its biggest single-session pop since its last earnings report on Aug. 4.

title: Amazon Stock Pops More Than 5% as Earnings and Revenue Crush Expectations
text: Third-quarter revenue grew 13% year over year, racing by Wall Street's expectation of 5% growth. Earnings per share surged 236%, crushing the 96% growth analysts had projected.

title: Sure, Microsoft grabbed the headlines, but Amazon still top dog in the cloud
text: We've talked about the first to market advantage before, and it certainly applies when it comes to the cloud infrastructure market. While Microsoft made headlines this week for its AI implementation, and Alphabet took a big stock hit for its slight cloud miss, Amazon growth has quietly settled into low double digits growth.

title: Market Clubhouse Morning Memo - October 27th, 2023 (Trade Strategy For SPY, QQQ, AAPL, MSFT, AMZN, TSLA, And GOOGL) - Invesco QQQ Trust, Series 1 (NASDAQ:QQQ)
text: Good Morning Traders! In today's Market Clubhouse Morning Memo, we will discuss SPY, QQQ, AAPL, MSFT, AMZN, TSLA, and GOOGL.

title: Amazon and Intel fire up the Nasdaq in welcome boost
text: Amazon.com Inc (NASDAQ:AMZN) and Intel Corp gave the Nasdaq a welcome boost on Friday, after a tough week for technology stocks, which followed poorly received results from Google-parent, Alphabet and Facebook-owner, Meta Platforms. Shares in Amazon rose 7.5% and Intel leapt 10.8% in early trading helping propel the Nasdaq more than 100 points to the good.

title: Amazon comes to a boil; complete price reversal in sight
text: Sluggish growth in the AWS segment or not, Amazon.com Inc. NASDAQ: AMZN is performing well in all segments, and its stock is poised to complete a total reversal.

title: What Amazon's CEO Just Said Should Excite Every Amazon Stock Shareholder
text: Amazon stock is up 6% after the company reported Q3 earnings. Is the stock a buy right now?

title: Why Are Stocks Up Today?
text: Stocks are up today and investors wondering why are in the right place as we know what's causing the market to rally on Friday! The biggest news that has stocks up today comes from Amazon (NASDAQ: AMZN ).

title: Walmart and Amazon Use AI in Battle for Third-Party Sellers
text: Amazon and Walmart aren't just battling for the eCommerce crown. They're also locked in an artificial intelligence (AI) rivalry to woo third-party sellers.

title: Amazon (AMZN) Stock Leads ‘Magnificent Seven' Higher After Earnings
text: Amazon (NASDAQ: AMZN ) stock is rising higher on Friday with the release of its Q3 2023 earnings report. The e-commerce company performed well during the quarter with its earnings per share of 94 cents beating out Wall Street's estimate of 59 cents per share.

title: Amazon shares jump as analysts praise third-quarter results
text: CEO Andy Jassy has been in cost-cutting mode over the past year, and analysts are encouraged that these efforts appear to be working.

title: Amazon, Intel, Deckers, Exxon, Chevron, Chevron, Ubisoft - Stocks on the move
text: Amazon.com Inc (NASDAQ:AMZN), up 5.25% to $125.85, last night reported better-than-expected financial results for its third quarter of 2023, with a notable beat on the bottom line. The e-commerce giant's quarterly earnings per share (EPS) came in at $0.94, a more than three-fold increase from a year earlier and much better than the $0.58 analyst consensus estimate.

title: 3 Revolutionary Stocks I'd Buy Right Now Without Hesitation
text: DexCom is seeing adoption of its devices soar, and its total addressable market just expanded significantly. Airbnb is constantly refining its platform for the modern traveler and host, and profits are exploding.

title: Dow Jones Today: Futures Mixed After Oil Giants Miss Earnings Estimates and Amazon Beats
text: Stock futures were mixed in premarket trading Friday as tech stocks rebounded from a two-day sell-off after Amazon topped earnings estimates while oil giants Chevron and Exxon weighed on energy.

title: Better Than Expected Earnings From Amazon And Intel
text: Earnings from Facebook parent, Meta along with Google parent, Alphabet, were partially responsible for the pullback Thursday.

title: Nextech3D.ai brings 3D models onto Amazon's Seller Central through Vornado Air expansion contract
text: Nextech3D.AI (CSE:NTAR, OTCQX:NEXCF) announced that it has signed an expanded 3D modelling contract with Vornado Air, a U.S. company specializing in the manufacturing and marketing of air circulators, air purifiers, heaters and humidifiers.

title: Amazon just taught Wall Street a new word — and it's a good one for the bulls
text: Amazon.com Inc. investors wanted to hear talk of a “reacceleration” in the company's cloud-computing business. Instead they learned a new word.

title: Bezos's Amazon doubles down on AI, not rockets
text: Artificial intelligence, not rockets, is where Amazon.com Inc (NASDAQ:AMZN) founder Jeff Bezos seems to be putting his money.   Amazon's chief executive Andy Jassy said at the release of the company's third-quarter financial results that the Amazon Web Services (AWS) team “continues to innovate and deliver at a rapid clip”.

title: Nasdaq called higher as Amazon brings relief; inflation data to come
text: 7:00am: Nasdaq to rally as Amazon and Intel lift the mood US stocks are expected to open on the front foot after Amazon brought some much needed cheer to technology stocks, although investors will also be keeping a wary eye on a key inflation gauge. In pre-market trading, futures for the Dow Jones Industrial Average were 0.1% higher, while those for the S&P 500 were up 0.5%, and contracts for the Nasdaq 100 futures rose 0.9%.

title: 7 Stocks Set to Soar in a Year-End Santa Claus Rally
text: We're nearing the year-end holidays, which is typically a positive time for the stock market and investors. Known as the “Santa Claus rally,” the stock market tends to rise steadily during the fourth quarter of the year, with share prices peaking in late December.

title: Morning Bid: Amazon and goldilocks ride to the rescue
text: A look at the day ahead in U.S. and global markets from Mike Dolan

title: Amazon Beefs Up Bottom Line as AI Battle Shapes Up
text: Record earnings should help the e-commerce titan compete with Microsoft and Google's deeper pockets.

title: Shares of Amazon, Intel climb after earnings beats, as NatWest and Sanofi tumble on warnings, and other stocks on the move
text: Intel Corp. stock INTC, -0.94% jumped 8% after the chipmaker beat expectations for its third quarter and delivered an upbeat forecast for the current quarter.

title: Amazon's Cloud Business Has Its Challengers. Analysts Think AI Is Key to Staying Dominant.
text: Amazon rallies after CEO Andy Jassy says the company's cloud-computing business won large contracts in the third quarter. Wall Street is looking for AI to drive future cloud growth.

title: S&P 500 futures rise after well-received Amazon and Intel results
text: U.S. stock futures pointed to brighter start on Friday to wrap up a difficult week, buoyed by well-received results from megacap tech stock Amazon.com.

title: Amazon posts strong revenue and profits, says it's in 'best position' it's ever been before holidays
text: Amazon on Thursday reported strong revenue and profits from the summer months driven by growth in online sales and its advertising business.

title: Amazon to bounce off five-month low after big earnings beat
text: Amazon.com Inc (NASDAQ:AMZN) shares are due to climb off their five-month low on Friday after the e-commerce giant reported better-than-expected financial results for its third quarter of 2023, with a notable beat on the bottom line.  The company's quarterly earnings per share (EPS) came in at $0.94, a more than three-fold increase from a year earlier and much better than the $0.58 analyst consensus estimate.
